value.halfverse: who has torn us and will heal us.
value.verse: Come, let us return to our God, *
God has struck us and will bind up our wounds, *

value.halfverse: that in God’s presence we may live.
value.verse: On the third day restore us, *
Let us humble ourselves, let us strive to know the Lord, *
value.halfverse:
whose justice dawns like morning light,
its dawning as sure as the sunrise.

value.verse: God’s justice will come to us like a shower, *
value.halfverse: like spring rains that water the earth.
